item.title: Broadcast on 10-Mar-2012
item.description: Mad pagan poetry, some farm ambient, a Babe rainbow remix and lashings of oddness on this maiden voyage...
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 1 of More Than Human

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Mar-2012
item.description: Weirdness abounds! Calgarian-Japanese synth-pop, art installation tunes and pagan acapella. Plus top tunes from Rustie, Pinch & Shackleton and Ekoplekz. Nice.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 2

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Mar-2012
item.description: New tracks from The Host, Belbury Poly and Golden Donna plus spectral soundtrack sounds and some very odd library music.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 3 of More Than Human

item.title: Broadcast on 31-Mar-2012
item.description: New tracks by Calamalka, Elos and Headboggle and some space age selections from the distant past. And the Olsen Twins!
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 4 of More Than Human

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Apr-2012
item.description: It's the Easter edition! New tracks from CLARK, OLD APPARATUS & DEMDIKE STARE plus some pagan hauntology sounds and a tribute to one of electronic music's fallen heroes. Nice.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 5

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Apr-2012
item.description: New Tracks by ELFMILK, AMBALANCE & JULIA HOLTER, French synthwave, a blues tune from Canada's earliest synthesizer and lots more. Cor.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 6

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Apr-2012
item.description: New tracks by MARTYN, DEEBS and VCMG as well as obscure soundtrack nonsense and yet another pagan sacrifice. Choice.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 7

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Apr-2012
item.description: New tracks by ACTRESS, TRAXMAN and KING FELIX plus occult madness from ATARAXIA in a special 90 minute version of the show. Fit.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 8 - Extended Edition

item.title: Broadcast on 05-May-2012
item.description: New tracks from CFCF, KWES and GEOFF BARROW plus all the usual nonsense...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 9

item.title: Broadcast on 12-May-2012
item.description: New SHACKLETON, LONE & LAST STEP plus 70's Brit horror, electronic soul and six - count 'em - six Germans. Blinding.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 10

item.title: Broadcast on 19-May-2012
item.description: RUSTIE! BABE RAINBOW! SQUAREPUSHER! DONNA SUMMER! ME! YOU! DANCING!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 11

item.title: Broadcast on 26-May-2012
item.description: New tracks from LAUREL HALO, MARTYN & TAPES plus vocoder madness from Alberta and a guest appearance by John Peel...
item.itunes:subtitle: More than Human - Episode 12

item.title: Broadcast on 30-May-2012
item.description: Spankingly new music from WALLS, LA VAMPIRES and JAM CITY plus Kollywood electronic soundtracks and a fab John Cale remix. Blimey.
item.itunes:subtitle: More than Human - Episode 13

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Jun-2012
item.description: Another super extended madness inducing 90 minutes with MORE THAN HUMAN. Gwan.
item.itunes:subtitle: More than Human - Episode 14

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Jun-2012
item.description: 2 exclusive tracks from MCENROE plus a new Ghost BOX STUDY SERIES 7" and lots of giddy electronic madness. Engineers.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 15

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Jun-2012
item.description: New tracks by KUEDO, POLYSICK and SAND CIRCLES plus the usual squelchy beeps...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - show 16

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Jul-2012
item.description: A More Than Human Special featuring the works of Jon Brooks plus all the usual electronic madness and goat slaughtering.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 17 - Jon Brooks Special

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Jul-2012
item.description: new tracks by DIGITS, FAY & SPOOLS plus a look at a new Soul Jazz compilation and some spoken word creation myths. Blimey.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 18

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Jul-2012
item.description: More brand new tracks than ever before including GATEKEEPER, BZARYN and COM TRUISE. It's proper mental.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 19

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Aug-2012
item.description: 90 minute Olympic spectacular including CHAMPION, CALAMALKA & BANDSHELL plus special co-host Matthew Griffiths. Gold!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 20 Summer Special

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Aug-2012
item.description: new tracks by Panabrite, Shed and Junior Boys it's summer fun all the way. Apart from the madness, murder and death.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human -ep21

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Aug-2012
item.description: All Canadian special with all the top weird cool and odd selections from Canada's electronic scene. Not at all polite.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 22

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Aug-2012
item.description: Accidentally horror-and-witch filed edition of MTH interspersed with the electronic splendour of THOLOGY, JON CONVEX, ROJ, FOUR TET and many, many more. Rejoice.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 23

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Aug-2012
item.description: Accidentally horror-and-witch filed edition of MTH interspersed with the electronic splendour of THOLOGY, JON CONVEX, ROJ, FOUR TET and many, many more. Rejoice.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 23

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Sep-2012
item.description: it's the one with a few cock-ups. And some top new music of course....
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human -episode 24

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Sep-2012
item.description: The stunning debut from Plays:four, some classic Orbital and the sacrifice of a cat. Two of these things happened.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 25

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Sep-2012
item.description: Assocites, Gay Cat Park, the Passanger - all of synthetic life is here...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 26

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Oct-2012
item.description: A MTH Thanksgiving special featuring Aphex Twin, Guyers Connection, Ekoplekz and a whole host of wonderful yours to keep forever moments. Kisses.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 27

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Oct-2012
item.description: A massively packed show with new lovliness from Beak, Daphni and Eagle Chalice plus some bonkers library selections and some pre-Halloween teasing. Sulphurous.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - Episode 28

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Oct-2012
item.description: New tracks from PYE CORNER AUDIO, VESSEL, and SLUGABED as well some rare Canadian library tracks. Synthetic ear warmers for the soul. Or something.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 29

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Oct-2012
item.description: The Halloween Special - guts, gore and glory all for you and our lord Satan.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 30

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Nov-2012
item.description: Quite a happy dancey edition of MTH - new Baauer, Michael Mayer and Daphni plus some older classics from The Fast Set and some German band called Kraftwerk....
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 31

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Nov-2012
item.description: A rather sticky show tonight full of jam-flecked synthesizers and icing on the microphone. Crucial.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 32

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Nov-2012
item.description: I'm very enthusiastic this week about everything we played - and quite right too as it was a smashing action-packed edition of MTH...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 33

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Dec-2012
item.description: Blimey that was a good one - chunky beats from LegoWelt and Lindstrom, remixes by DJ Rashad and Gold Panda, pagan poetry, Iranian experimental music and the lovely Grimes. All for you.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 34

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Dec-2012
item.description: Lee Gamble, Claro Intelecto, Survive and many more top tunes sandwiched between a very real attempt to recreate a black hole in the studio. The engineer was not amused...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 35

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Jan-2013
item.description: We're back on iTunes with a packed show with special guest co-host Matthew Griffiths and his lovely hangover....
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 39

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Jan-2013
item.description: Well there was absolute chaos in the studio tonight but I think we pulled it off with a top selection including Kelpe, Jacques Greene and Demdike Stare. Quite good all round.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 40

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Jan-2013
item.description: New tracks from Jack Dice, FaltyDL and Powell plus some synth soundtrack selections and all the usual gig news and creepy interludes from me. Woozy.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 41

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Jan-2013
item.description: New tracks from Raime, Howse and Headaches plus tune in to see if we successfully manage to levitate the studio cat. Floaty.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 42

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Feb-2013
item.description: New tracks from Bonobo, Steve Moore and Forma, some library tracks from Tod Dockstader, and of course a little bit of Kraftwerk in honour of their upcoming concerts...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 43

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Feb-2013
item.description: Hello again! Here's a brand new podcast full of UMBERTO, BRUCE HAACK and MATMOS plus a ton of dedications and a humorous moment where my headphones get stuck under my chair. See if you can spot it.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 44

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Mar-2013
item.description: It's the FUNDRIVE edition so get your money out!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 45

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Mar-2013
item.description: Special International Women's Day edition featuring Holly, Delia, Daphne, Laurie, Suzanne and many many more. Plus one man. Me.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 46 - women in electronic music edition

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Mar-2013
item.description: husky voiced DJ plays new tracks by Pye Corner Audio, Kelpe and Karl Bartos. Concrete.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 47

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Mar-2013
item.description: Willfully eccentric line-up of tunes tonight including two cover versions, horror soundtracks, pagan poetry and hauntology. Got quite freaked out myself.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human - episode 48

item.title: Broadcast on 31-Mar-2013
item.description: Easter special featuring live sacrifices, robot-cat augmentation, plus top tracks by Metamono, DJ Koze, Doldrums, Tapes and much, much more. Pagan.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 49

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Apr-2013
item.description: A spankingly good 50th anniversary show with top tunes from Sofaboy, Boundary and Kemper Norton plus live in the studio special guest Matthew Griffiths. Wertarbeit!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 50

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Apr-2013
item.description: Top tunes from Cloudsce, OKPK and the Coombe, plus our first competition and we discover time-travel. For reals.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 51

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Apr-2013
item.description: Great new tunes from UN, Hacker Farm and Karl Bartos plus vintage tunes from BOC and the Metronomes, and an actual witch's spell for getting a better DJ to host this show!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 52

item.title: Broadcast on 05-May-2013
item.description: Techno, soundtracks, synth-wave, dark bass, nipple house - something for all my children on this week's super-hot show. It was rather warm in the studio. Cthulu.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 53

item.title: Broadcast on 12-May-2013
item.description: Donna Summer, Focus Group, awful pronunciations of people's names, dedications, library music and a small crisis in Studio 1. Just another top edition of More Than Human. Bless.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 54

item.title: Broadcast on 19-May-2013
item.description: Van Did - Terre 8prn - The Stoner Principles of Geometry - A Mountain for President NHK Koyxen - Front Forward Birds are Pipiie Granito - Messages Clockwork - Second Floor Mount Kimbie - Made to Stray Silver Alert - Etoile Polaire: Little Dipper Agor - Train The Passenger - Post Wave (demo) Oneohtrix Point Never - Moonlight Common Vernacular - Space Time Duality
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 55 w/ Guest Host James Bates (Common Vernacular)

item.title: MTH 56 May 26, 2013
item.description: New Boards of Canada, Headspace, and Glimpse. Also featuring the super professional radio voice of James Bates. Repping Vancouver with Aquarian Foundation and Neu Balance. Who's Daft Punk? Never heard of them.
item.itunes:subtitle: MTH 56 w/ guest host James Bates (Common Vernacular)

item.title: 02-Jun-2013
item.description: John Tejada, Augustine Wrong, and Boundary. Montreal has some pretty good music. Save Zoo Zhop!
item.itunes:subtitle: MTH 57 w/ guest host James Bates (Common Vernacular)

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Jun-2013
item.description: I'm back from Mutek with some top new tunes from Augustine Wrong, Lee Gamble and Jon Hopkins, plus an interview with Mount Kimbie and rarities from Rodion G A and CAT STEVENS. It's a strange world...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 58

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Jun-2013
item.description: Much hilarity when Brian Eno pops into the studio with his new puppy. Not really. Just lots of great tunes from CFCF, BOC, the Focus Group and Stellar OM Source. click click drone.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 59

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Jun-2013
item.description: Strange bonus Friday fill-in edition of MTH with lots of tasty bleepy treats that may or may not be repeated on Sunday's official show...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 59.5

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Jun-2013
item.description: Sweaty techno Summer edition of MTH with lots of thumpers from Polysick, Arpadys and Juju & Jordash plus the new Ghost Box Study Series single. Glistening.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 60

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Jul-2013
item.description: Announcing More Than Human Records! Previewing The Outer Church! Playing spankingly funky new tracks from Pharaohs, Stealth Mode and Marcus Marr! It's all rather nice. Enjoy.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 61

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Jul-2013
item.description: 120 minutes of UN, Jonas Reinhardt, Ekoplekz, Kemper Norton, Steve Moore, Zomby and much, much more. With special co-host Matthew Griffiths.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 62 - 2 hour special

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Jul-2013
item.description: Wonderful selection of electronic tunes interspersed with brilliantly inept DJing! Outer Church, Prurient, Jeff MIlls, New Forms Festival and much much more...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 63 - 2hr special editon

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Aug-2013
item.description: Quite a dark, uncanny show tonight considering the sunshine outside. New tracks from Common Vernacular, Zomby, Grumbking Fur and some vintage oddness from BBC Radiophonic Workshop. Summer spookiness...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 64

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Aug-2013
item.description: Darkness, destruction and death; and that's just the production team! Another quip filled edition of the nation's favourite electronic music show. This week Ommm, Jon Hopkins, Old Apparatus and much much more.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 65

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Sep-2013
item.description: New Forms preview. Locked out of the studio edition. Space rap. Dinosaurs. It's a microhouse kebab.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 66

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Sep-2013
item.description: And we're back from our holidays and horrible work commitments to bring you 2 full hours of all that is new, weird and deeply unsettling in the world of experimental electronic music. We did all for you.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 66

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Sep-2013
item.description: Welcoming the autumn with some very strange selections tonight including Holly Herndon, Rashad Becker and Black Sites. Chilly.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 67

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Sep-2013
item.description: Matthew Griffiths joins me for another hour of weird and wonderful tunes from the world of electronic music; top tracks from Oneohtrix Point Never, Ekoplekz, Plath and much much more. Twerky.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 68

item.title: 06-Oct-2013
item.description:
Common Vernacular guest hosts. Sounds from COMA, The Field, Phillip Glass. Notes: Arrive on time. Make sure your technology is in working order before you arrive.
Suggested parings: Salads, Grilled Vegetables, Picnic Food, BBQs, Fruit Desserts.
item.itunes:subtitle: MTH 69

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Oct-2013
item.description: A hour of thanksgiving to some excellent artists such as Forest Swords, Kensington Gore and Machine Drum plus a Goblin ticket giveaway. It's all go round here....
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 70

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Oct-2013
item.description: A slightly truncated edition due to some well dodgy technology . But we survived and played new tracks from House in the Woods, Metamono, Spacedog, Kensington Gore and much much more. Quite spooky in parts.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 71

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Oct-2013
item.description: A sickeningly corrupt display of horror and depravity. Plus tunes by Ataraxia, Goblin, Umberto, OH/EX/OH, and Rick Wakeman!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 72 - Halloween Special

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Nov-2013
item.description: A cosmically themed show with French library music, Laurel Halo, Tim Hecker, Metamono, Red Math, a gig guide and a surprise appearance by Carl Sagan. Universal.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 73

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Nov-2013
item.description: The numbering system goes awry! Nevertheless a jam-packed show full of genre-jumping: trap, techno, library, spoken word and new age. Variety. Spice. All for the discerning uneasy listener...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 75

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Nov-2013
item.description: Nicely engorged 2 hour special with guest co-host Matthew Griffiths and a whole host of experimental and electronic beauties: Daniel Avery, FIS, Time Attendant, Nathan Fake and much much more. Matthew forgot to bring biscuits though so he won't be returning.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 76 - revised edition!

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Dec-2013
item.description: Surprisingly upbeat edition - at least for the first half. But we get into dark recesses soon enough. Robin The Fog, Time Attendant, Egyptrixx, and a look at the latest releases from Mood Hut. Happiness. Then fear.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 77

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Dec-2013
item.description: By turns relaxing and unnerving, MTH this week featured such strange visitors as Gareth Rees, Akkord, Jez Butler, The Coombe and many more. We also chatted about gigs, solstices and buying records for Christmas. Splendid.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 78

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Dec-2013
item.description: James Bates stops by to entertain with remixes and Hypnotic grooves from the likes of Time Attendant, The Passenger, Ectoplasm, and Common Vernacular. Happy non-denominational holiday tidings to all.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 79

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Dec-2013
item.description: 2 hour end of year special, counting down 24 of the best beats and bleeps with guest star Matthew Griffiths. Solstice!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 80

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Dec-2013
item.description: Rather invigorating selection to fill the black void between Xmas and 2014. Top trumps from John Carpenter, Kowton, Steve Moore and lots more. Alpha and Omega.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 81

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Jan-2014
item.description: The first show of 2014 jam-packed (a phrase I seem to repeat incessantly on the show) with strangeness, weirdness and oddness. Arovane, The Passenger, Time Attendant, Police Des Moeurs, gig guide and details of the forthcoming More Than Human release party. All quite champion.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 82

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Jan-2014
item.description: A very synth-heavy moody show with sacrificial offerings from Pye Corner Audio, Kone, Karen Novotny X, John Foxx and much more. Staring intensely. At you.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 83

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Feb-2014
item.description: A very strange hour tonight even by this show's standard. I'm rather inarticulate due to the massive MTH party on Friday. But great music: Pye Corner Audio, Man Made Hill, Mara TK , Time Attendant, music form schools, and some imaginary TV themes. Functional.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 84

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Feb-2014
item.description: House, gay porn soundtracks, Italian library music, Montreal ambient, exclusive tracks from 1080p and the new Pender Street Steppers 12"? What do you want? Blood?
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 85

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Feb-2014
item.description: A surprise mid-week edition of MTH featuring a rather upbeat mix of beats and bleeps from Holly Herndon, Com Truise, Pender Street Steppers, knot in and Kraftwerk. I've had lots of tea.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 85

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Feb-2014
item.description: A post-Olympics snow-filled feast of beats and weirdness from myself and guest co-host and executive producer Matthew Griffiths. 2 hours long but flies by in a par-sec. Infinitum...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 87

item.title: 02-Mar-2014
item.description: Experimental broadcast for the big Fundrive show features plenty of Vancouver talent, including Neu Balance, Tall Jamal, Tim Hecker, and The Passenger. Very strange sounds near the end. I'm not saying it was aliens. But it was aliens. Also I ask people for money a lot. We are an independent station don't you know!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 88

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Mar-2014
item.description: Very special edition of More Than Human with guest DJ Kuma. Chats about the Art of Beatz, TKG and the Pan Ambient series, plus his thoughts of ten years broadcasting electronic goodness. Plus mighty mighty tunes. CAKE!
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 89

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Mar-2014
item.description: Subdued, sinister, slightly spiteful. But enough about me. The show was quite god this week especially the excellent tunes by Ekoplekz, Poemss, FIS, Susan Justin and many more. It's all for you....
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 90

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Mar-2014
item.description: A rather great selection of weird and wonderful tunes including new tracks from Vermont! Plaid, bronze and much much more. Semi-pro.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 91

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Mar-2014
item.description: A 2hr special edition of More Than Human with a stunning array of electronic and experimental top tunes - including Ekoplekz, Poemss, Barbarella, Lord of the Isles, Brian Eno, Laurel Halo - interspersed with the over-caffeinated ramblings of your brain-damaged host. Excessive.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 92

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Apr-2014
item.description: A rather sunny, meaty and beaty 60 minutes featuring Bobby Draino, Millie & Andrea, Legowelt, Frankie Knuckles, gig news, waffle and deep, deep insight. Jack your body.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 93

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Apr-2014
item.description: The 94th edition features tracks by Some Truths, The Passenger, Vintage Nike, Craig Leon, Rodion GA and Todd Terje - the show goes very well with a cold beverage, a sunny patio and a slightly raised eyebrow.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 94

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Apr-2014
item.description: A 2-hr long weekend special featuring remixes from the Vincent Parker LP, Bass Clef, BBC Radiophonic Workshop, Lost Trail, Move D, Keudo plus lots more; all fueled by chocolate, caffeine and a cheeky on-air sacrifice. Pagan pleasures.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 95

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Apr-2014
item.description: Mixed emotions on tonight's show as we mark the death of DJ Rashad with two fantastic tracks; we're much happier about the return of Evy Jane and electronic beauty from Steve Moore, Craig Leon, Larry Heard, Auscultation and many more. Happysad.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 96

item.title: Broadcast on 02-May-2014
item.description: What time is it? A multi-dimensional edition of More Than Human straddling multiple time zones and head-space. Music from Bass Clef, Oneohtrix Point Never, Vincent Parker, Belbury Poly, Mark E, Egyptian Lover and a ticket give-away fail. Twisty.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 97

item.title: Broadcast on 11-May-2014
item.description: LNYRDCROY, Actress, Phantom Head Trip and more on More Than Human. MOAR. RAR.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 98

item.title: Broadcast on 15-May-2014
item.description: Well sweaty in the studio today - partly the heat but mostly the top tunes! Twin Tub, DJ Hype, Add N To (X), Todd Terje, Phillip Western & Fatima Al Qadiri plus details about the upcoming 100th edition. Drippy.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 99

item.title: Broadcast on 25-May-2014
item.description: A 2-hour special celebrating our 100th edition of MTH with special guests Matthew Griffiths, James Bates, Maegan Thomas and a live in-studio session from The Passenger. Plus tons of top tunes. Justified and ancient.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 100

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Jun-2014
item.description: Sunny Summery beats with only the occasional foray into the experimental. Lovely. DJ Hell, Khotin, Fatima Al Qadiri. Some top lion noises as well...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 101

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Jun-2014
item.description: Top tune selection from special guest James Frain plus gig guide and usual blather from me. Khotin, Joey Anderson, Orbital, Fast Eddie and much more. Memory bliss...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 102

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Jun-2014
item.description: After a few weeks away MTH was back in fine form - gig news, informed opinions about all the new releases and lots more :) Pye Corner Audio, Ekoplekz, Dieter Moebius, Craig Leon & more...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 103

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Jun-2014
item.description: After a few weeks away MTH was back in fine form - gig news, informed opinions about all the new releases and lots more :) Pye Corner Audio, Ekoplekz, Dieter Moebius, Craig Leon & more...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 103

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Jul-2014
item.description: Blimey. 104. Executive producer Matthew Griffiths joined me this evening for a full hour of ozploitation soundtracks, drone euphoria, acid downtempo and lots of other crazy stuff. 'Twas fun. Listen. Now.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 104

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Jul-2014
item.description: Blimey. 104. Executive producer Matthew Griffiths joined me this evening for a full hour of ozploitation soundtracks, drone euphoria, acid downtempo and lots of other crazy stuff. 'Twas fun. Listen. Now.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 104

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Jul-2014
item.description: A full 2 hour Summer spectacular from your friends at More Than Human with spankingly new tracks from Babe Rainbow, Cloudface, Woodbines & Spiders, COH, Brett Naucke and loads more. Cat sacrifice occurs about halfway through. Monster.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 105

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Jul-2014
item.description: Anything exciting or interesting on this week's More Than Human can be put down to the presence of a visiting studio engineer form Montreal, Amelia. We did play some fantastic tunes though - Dolly Dolly, ATM, Cloudface, Jon Hopkins - plus the usual gig guide and inane chatter. Spiky.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 106

item.title: 27-Jul-2014
item.description: Noise Floor Preview with Sinoia Caves, Gammawave, DJ B and all kinds of Vancouver talent. Featuring the crass humour of Common Vernacular.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 107

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Aug-2014
item.description: Gareth is back in the chair after a summer holiday with new tracks from Time Attendant, Dalhous, Coppe & Sinoia Caves plus previews of the forthcoming New Forms Festival and Noise Floor 002. Splendid.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 107

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Aug-2014
item.description: 90 minutes of new, old and obscure electronic and experimental treats. On tonights show we have the debut 12 form the new Cambria imprint, previews of the forthcoming New Forms Festival, some new 1080p stuff, apocalyptic soundtracks and much much more. Pyrrhic.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 109

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Sep-2014
item.description: A cracking 60 minutes of top electronic/experimental weirdness with new tracks from Kemper Norton, Hacker Farm, Gammawave, Taal Mala, Charlatan, Yaaard plus an international gig guide and lots of strong tea. And one swear word. Autumnal.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 110

item.title: Broadcast on 7-Sep-2014
item.description: The first Aphex Twin track in 13 years. Delivered by blimp. Interview with Cloudface. New Forms 14 showcase. Gather 'round the old radio and listen as guest host James Bates downs two tall boys and gets frisky.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 111

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Sep-2014
item.description: One last look at the performers coming up on this week's mighty New Forms Festival including an exclusive interview with Sinoia Caves and tracks from Ekoplekz, Inga Copeland, Cloudface, Tangerine Dream and much more. Widescreen.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 112

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Sep-2014
item.description: A bonus beat edition of More Than Human on a Thursday afternoon - same treats, different time slot: Aphex, T.E.W., Lee Gamble, Sinoia Caves, Morton Subotnick. Teatime.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 113

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Sep-2014
item.description: A post New Forms Festival comedown edition of MTH tonight - although not especially mellow. New tracks from Loscil, Kemper Norton. Lee Gamble, Antenna Happy, Vessel and lots more. DJ was a bit all over the shop though. Chips and beans.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 114

item.title: More Than Human 114 Broadcast on 28-Sep-2014
item.description: 2 hour monster edition in which the Listening Center, Not Waving, Taal Mala, Wesley Matsell, Grumbling Fur were played, too much chocolate was consumed and we said goodbye to Mollie (not a euphemism). Sugary.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 114

item.title: More Than Human 116 - Broadcast on 05-Oct-2014
item.description: A messy show to be sure but filled with crumbling jammy tunes from Loscil, Heatsick & Monolithium plus a strawberry gig guide and lemony interjections from me. Nonsense.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 116

item.title: More Than Human 117 - Broadcast on 12-Oct-2014
item.description: Dark, cerebral, and downtempo Thanksgiving edition of More Than Human. Common Vernacular guest hosts. Tunes from Phil Western, Phantom Head Trip, Flying Lotus and more.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 117

item.title: More Than Human 118 -Broadcast on 26-Oct-2014
item.description: A very unsettling Halloween edition of More Than Human with new cuts from Kemper Norton, Bing & Ruth and The Passenger; horror treats from John Carpenter, Giuliano Sorgini, library madness from Don Harper and much more. Spoilers: the studio car gets away again...
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 118

item.title: More Than Human 119 - Broadcast on 02-Nov-2014
item.description: A thrilling 60 minutes of electronic treats including ancient glories from Bruce Lacey, Rudiger Lorenz and Delia Derbyshire as well as offerings from upstarts OOBE and Objekt; plus gig previews from Phil Western & Martin Rev. Indulge.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 119

item.title: More Than Human 120 - Broadcast on 16-Nov-2014
item.description: A slightly claustrophobic show tonight with excellent cuts from Loscil, The Advisory Circle, Donald Fraser, Luke Abbott and many more. Gig guide and a shout out to the excellent kickstarter campaign about Suzanne Ciani. All engulfing.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 120

item.title: More Than Human 121 - Broadcast on 23-Nov-2014
item.description: A very messy More Than Human this week but blessed with mighty tunes from Andy Stott, Vladislav Delay, Akkord and Loscil. Plus me moaning about moving house. Transitory.
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Human 121
